name: Backyard Fencing
description:
This game is a prototype made in 2 days for the STLScatterJam in 2014.

Kids attempt to recreate a fencing match by throwing things at each other in an epic dual to rule the backyard.

Input:
Player1
Move = WASD
Attack = C
Block = V

Player2
Move = Arrow Keys
Attack = ,
Block = .

Made by:
Little Big Bro
Code- @AndSevers
Art- @Bsevers18
Music by UncleBibby from freemusicarchive.org

Made in Gamemaker Studio
